item.title: DEFRAUDify
item.description:
Funded by: EU ITEA4. Project ID: 18007.

October 2019 – March 2023.

Total funding: 10M Euro.

DEFRAUDify aims to develop tools that help private businesses to detect fraudulent behaviour on the internet. These tools are partly based on existing tools that have been developed for Law Enforcement. They will be adapted to become relevant for private businesses as well. DEFRAUDify aims at businesses that encounter negative impacts from internet organized fraudulent behaviour. The tools will consist of a set of interoperable tools that jointly analyse suspicious behaviour and provide situational awareness.
